text: David Main (1888 – 1961) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1888 births Category:1961 deaths Category:Footballers from Falkirk Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Falkirk F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Aberdeen F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Davie Main
